EmailTemplate.subject: Last Chance to Get Your ADS-B Upgrade for Embraer 135/145 with Special Price
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> <[[http://newunitedgoderich.com/]]>
Embraer 135/145 ADS-B Out STC by New United Goderich
Don't let this offer pass by you! For a limited time, New United Goderich is offering full installation of the ADS-B (OUT) solution, as well as, the sale of partial installation kits with special prices.
Save time and money and upgrade with Honeywell Authorized Dealer, New United Goderich, and take advantage of their ADS-B (Out) STC for Embraer 135/145 aircrafts.
Contact New United Goderich to upgrade your Embraer 135/145 today!
UPGRADE TODAY <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/ADS-B_New_United_Goderich_Email.html]]>
*Contact us to get more information about prices and availability.
